mainBoard.flavorText: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.
mainBoard.name: Air Elemental

foreignData.name: Magiergeselle
foreignData.text: Du kannst den Magiergesellen in Deinem Zug vor Deinem Angriff tappen, damit er einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zufügt.

mainBoard.name: Apprentice Sorcerer
mainBoard.originalText: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Apprentice Sorcerer to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

mainBoard.text: {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Their ships pollute our air as they themselves pollute our forest."
—Arathel, elvish queen
mainBoard.name: Talas Air Ship

foreignData.name: Erforscher der Talas
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Erforscher der Talas aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, schaue Dir die Karten auf der Hand Deines Gegners an.

mainBoard.name: Talas Explorer
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Talas Explorer comes into play from your hand, look at your opponent's hand.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
When this creature enters, look at target opponent's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: The trader let loose a laugh that made all around him check their purses.
mainBoard.name: Talas Merchant

mainBoard.flavorText:
From time, knowledge.
From knowledge, power.

foreignData.name: Gelehrter der Talas
foreignData.text: Du kannst den Gelehrten der Talas in Deinem Zug vor dem Angriff tappen, um eine Karte zu ziehen.

mainBoard.name: Talas Researcher
mainBoard.originalText: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Talas Researcher to draw a card.

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

mainBoard.text: {T}: Draw a card. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Scouting a battle before you fight it is just good business."
—Jefan, Talas ship captain
mainBoard.name: Talas Scout

mainBoard.flavorText: The sea is in their blood. Literally.

foreignData.name: Krieger der Talas
foreignData.text: Die Krieger der Talas können nicht geblockt werden.

mainBoard.name: Talas Warrior

foreignData.name: Erschöpfung
foreignData.text: Zu Beginn des nächsten Zuges Deines Gegners überspringt dieser das Enttappen seiner Kreaturen und Länder.

mainBoard.name: Exhaustion
mainBoard.originalText: At the beginning of your opponent's next turn, he or she skips untapping creatures and lands.

rulings.text: The creatures and lands are only prevented from untapping during the targeted player’s next untap step. They can still can untap during other player’s untap steps.
No creatures or lands controlled by the player will untap during their next untap step. This includes those which entered the battlefield after Exhaustion resolved.

mainBoard.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during their next untap step.

foreignData.name: Verfehlte Beschwörung
foreignData.text: Sprich Verfehlte Beschwörung nur als Antwort auf einen Beschwörungszauber. Die Kreaturenkarte hat keinen Effekt, und der Spieler legt sie auf seinen Friedhof.

mainBoard.name: False Summoning
mainBoard.originalText: Play False Summoning only in response to another player playing a creature. That creature card has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.

foreignData.name: Geheimnisvolle Ablehnung
foreignData.text: Sprich die Geheimnisvolle Ablehnung nur als Antwort auf einen Beschwörungszauber oder eine Hexerei. Diese Karte hat keinen Effekt, und der Spieler legt sie auf seinen Friedhof.

mainBoard.name: Mystic Denial
mainBoard.originalText: Play Mystic Denial only in response to another player playing a creature or a sorcery. That card has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.
mainBoard.text: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The ogre had come from out of the blue, so that's where I sent it back."
—Talas wizard

foreignData.name: Zeitebbe
foreignData.text: Lege eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl aus dem Spiel zurück oben auf die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers.

mainBoard.name: Time Ebb
mainBoard.originalText: Return any one creature from play to the top of its owner's library.
mainBoard.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

mainBoard.flavorText: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I *do* have."
mainBoard.name: Touch of Brilliance
